edge: At the age of 16, Pi becomes dangerously close to Richard Parker, a Bengal tiger, in their family-owned zoo. Later, during a storm on the Japanese freighter they are traveling on, Pi gets separated from his family and finds himself sharing a lifeboat with a freed plains zebra and the surviving Richard Parker after the ship sinks.

In secondary school, Pi adopts the Greek letter 'Pi' as his nickname to avoid bullying after his father names him Piscine Molitor Patel, which is a homage to Piscine Molitor, a famous French swimming pool.
Pi is raised in a polytheistic Hindu family.
